mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice(notice_title, notice_content, notice_category, notice_regdate, notice_isshow, member_id, view_cnt) VALUES (#{notice_title}, #{notice_content}, #{notice_category}, now(), "Y", #{member_id}, 0);
mapper.select: SELECT n.notice_no, n.notice_title, n.notice_content, n.notice_category, n.notice_regdate, n.notice_isshow, n.member_id, n.view_cnt, fn.file_no as file_no, fn.file_name as file_name, fn.file_rename as file_rename, fn.file_path as file_path, fn.file_date as file_date FROM notice n LEFT JOIN filenotice fn ON n.notice_no = fn.notice_no WHERE n.notice_no = #{notice_No};

SELECT n.notice_no, n.notice_title, n.notice_content, n.notice_category, n.notice_regdate, n.notice_isshow, n.member_id, n.view_cnt, fn.file_no as file_no, fn.file_name as file_name, fn.file_rename as file_rename, fn.file_path as file_path, fn.file_date as file_date FROM notice n LEFT JOIN filenotice fn ON n.notice_no = fn.notice_no WHERE n.notice_no = #{notice_No};
